Texts.Chs: 把^green;增强铠甲^reset;带给^orange;科学前哨站^reset;的^orange;凯文^reset;
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Booster Croptop^reset; to ^orange;Kevin^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 嗨!哥们!我现在需要点衣服把我平时用来撸的充气娃娃装扮的像^green;我同事他母亲^reset;那样... 你能用你的^green;纺车^reset;纺车给我做一件^orange;增强铠甲^reset;么？别拿那种眼神看着我，你看我像是会织布的人么？嘘！别说了不用谢我赶快去做我会给你报酬的.
Texts.Eng: I need to dress a pleasure doll to look exactly like ^green;a coworkers mother^reset;... Can you make me a ^orange;Booster Croptop^reset;? in a ^green;Sewing Wheel^reset;? I suck at sewing, and I'll pay you. Shh!

Texts.Chs: 很好，计划可以进行到第二阶段了! 他绝对想不到会有什么东西在等着他的233333。多谢了，你带来的铠甲。为了表达我的谢意，我决定送你这个超棒的公文包！嘘！别在这打开，这个宝贝被同事看见了可是会^green;很眼红^reset;的，相信我。
Texts.Eng: Now for phase two! He'll never see it coming! Thanks for the help. Take this awesome briefcase. Don't open it here, or everyone will get ^green;super jealous^reset; and try to steal it. Trust me.
